casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Jordan, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Jordan, 128 Ohio St.3d 268, 2011-Ohio-737.]

(No. 2010-1868 Submitted February 1, 2011 Decided February 22, 2011.)

{¶ 1} The discretionary appeal is accepted.

*269Dennis Watkins, Trumbull County Prosecuting Attorney, and LuWayne Annos, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant.

{¶ 2} The portion of the judgment of the court of appeals addressing appellant’s first assignment of error below is reversed on the authority of State v. Hodge, 128 Ohio St.3d 1, 2010-Ohio-6320, 941 N.E.2d 768.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur.
